#summary This page guides the user on how to change the Theme applied on the site including changing colors and fonts.

= How to update the colors and fonts on site =

Follow the below mentioned steps to modify the colors or fonts on the site.

  # Click on Site Actions -> Site Settings
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/SiteSettings.jpg
  # Under the *Look and Feel* section, click *Site Theme* option.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/SiteThemeLink.jpg  
  # You can see, the current theme applied on the site is the custom template theme (BrickRed Small Business Theme).
  # Change any color or the font to say *Viner Hand ITC*, and click Apply.
 http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/ChangeFonts.jpg
  # The new selected font gets applied on the entire site and is visible to all the users.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/fontsApplied.jpg
